articles.author: Michelle Starr
articles.title: Rare Sky Explosion Coming Soon: a Once-in-a-Lifetime Event Visible to The Naked Eye - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Sometime in the next few months, a spectacle could light up the northern sky.
articles.content:
Sometime in the next few months, a spectacle could light up the northern sky.
There, in the Corona Borealis constellation, at a distance of more than 2,500 light-years, a star called T Coronae Borea… [+3870 chars]
